title: BRIEF-Dana Inc Selected As Driveline Supplier For New Chevrolet Silverado 4500HD, 5500HD, And 6500HD Chassis Cab Trucks​
text: March 22, 2018 / 9:17 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Dana Inc Selected As Driveline Supplier For New Chevrolet Silverado 4500HD, 5500HD, And 6500HD Chassis Cab Trucks​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 22 (Reuters) - Dana Inc: * ‍ANNOUNCED THAT IT HAS BEEN SELECTED AS DRIVELINE SUPPLIER FOR NEW CHEVROLET SILVERADO 4500HD, 5500HD, AND 6500HD CHASSIS CAB TRUCKS​ * ‍PRODUCTION OF SILVERADO CLASS 4, 5, AND 6 TRUCKS IS SLATED TO BEGIN IN LATE 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
